channel.title: briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL
channel.description: This is a randomly ordered feed of the most recent entries from briefUpdatesBreakingOffshootNL, skipping any feeds with errors.

item.title: The Grand Canyon Fire Has North Rim Residents Wary of the Future
item.description: Fire crews allowed a fire to burn through brush on the Grand Canyon’s North Rim. Then they lost control.

item.title: Broadway’s ‘Gypsy’ Revival, Starring Audra McDonald, Will Close
item.description: The show is the sixth musical to announce a closing date since last month’s Tony Awards, reflecting financial challenges facing producers.

item.title: Migration Fears Turn Europe’s Borderless Dreams Into Traffic Nightmares
